_header: And when the angels thus had done / From the herds to heaven…
Subjects: Christ, birth of; sermon texts, Gospel
_description: Gospel ‘In aurora diei natalis domini’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: And when þe angels þus had doneffro þe hirdes to heuyn þai parted sone…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …So him to luf here he vs wisÞat we may lif in lastand blis
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Pastores loquebantur ad inuicem.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In aurora diei natalis domini Euangelium secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 14ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols.
